comments.comment: Among any other MOBA, dota 2 is by far the most complex and challenging. That's why players stay loyal to it even tho there are some bugs and toxic players. Mechanics, complexity, interaction, and gameplay itself put dota on top.Yes it hard. Yes there are toxicity on it. But those things cannot outweigh the fun and the thrill of the game.Comeback possibly is the best.A single misstep can ruin the while game. You feel adrenalin just by playing while sitting

title: GOD OF WAR PC Walkthrough Gameplay Part 1 - INTRO (FULL GAME)
description: PC God of War Gameplay Walkthrough Part 1 of the God of War (God of War 4) Campaign including a Review for PC and PS5 / PlayStation 5. My God of War (God of War 4 / GoW 4) Gameplay Walkthrough will feature the Full Game Story Campaign on Ultra Settings. This Full Game God of War PS5 (GoW PS5) Gameplay Walkthrough includes a Review, Weapons, Armor, Skills, Artifacts, Enemies, Bosses, Journey Missions, Story Missions, Campaign Chapters, Runic, Single Player, Cinematics, Cut Scenes and more until the Ending of the Single Player Story. Thanks PlayStation for giving me the Full Game of God of War on PC.

comments.comment: I  remember watching you play through this the first time..my buddy just got the PS5 for Xmas and I told him this game was a must. And now getting to experience it again with you is a nice lil pregame for Ragnarok, much love brad keep it up!

2018 was such an amazing year for video games. Early on you got games like God Of War, Far Cry 5, Monster Hunter World, A Way Out, Detroit Become Human and the late half was equally bloody spectacular with Marvel's Spider-Man, Shadow of the Tomb Raider, Red Dead Redemption 2, Hitman 2. It was just an awesome year overall and an impressive year for gaming. God, it feels like a thousand years ago.

Mannn... finallyyy it's here on PC. The last time we were on this journey with Brad I was still in school and now I can experience this game by myself as well. What a well-crafted game this is edit: much love to Brad for his amazing walkthroughs as well <3

title: GOD OF WAR PC Walkthrough GaGod Of War Ragnarok - PlayStation Showcase 2021 Reveal Trailer | PS5meplay Part 1 - INTRO (FULL GAME)
description: Kratos and Atreus must journey to each of the Nine Realms in search of answers as they prepare for the prophesied battle that will end the world. Together, Kratos and Atreus venture deep into the Nine Realms in search of answers as Asgardian forces prepare for war.Along the way they will explore stunning, mythical landscapes, gather allies from across the realms, and face fearsome enemies in the form of Norse gods and monsters. As the threat of RagnarÃ¶k grows ever closer, Kratos and Atreus find themselves choosing between the safety of their family and the safety of the realms...

comments.comment: Stop thinking like a father for a moment and start acting like a general!
games like these are so large, expansive and so well done both artistically and technically that if there was a movie made and it didn't look and feel like this it would absolutely bomb lol
A decade ago, I would've laughed at the idea of imagining Kratos as the calm, reasonable guy pushing for peace. Yet here we are... The man's truly come a long way.

title: GOD OF WAR PC Gameplay Walkthrough Part 1 FULL GAME [4K 60FPS ULTRA] - No Commentary
description: From Santa Monica Studio and creative director Cory Barlog comes a new beginning for one of gamingâ€™s most recognizable icons. Living as a man outside the shadow of the gods, Kratos must adapt to unfamiliar lands, unexpected threats, and a second chance at being a father. Together with his son Atreus, the pair will venture into the brutal Norse wilds and fight to fulfill a deeply personal quest. His vengeance against the Gods of Olympus years behind him, Kratos now lives as a man in the realm of Norse Gods and monsters. It is in this harsh, unforgiving world that he must fight to surviveâ€¦And teach his son to do the same. This startling reimagining of God of War deconstructs the core elements that defined the series satisfying combat breathtaking scale and a powerful narrative and fuses them anew. Kratos is a father again. As mentor and protector to Atreus, a son determined to earn his respect, he is forced to deal with and control the rage that has long defined him while out in a very dangerous world with his son.

comments.comment: What an unbelievable game. Probably the best I have ever played. What a journey! Thank you for the video
games like these are so large, expansive and so well done both artistically and technically that if there was a movie made and it didn't look and feel like this it would absolutely bomb lol

This game truly has a great story, such a one that you really lose yourself in the game. No two parts are similar with a whole bunch of different enemies. Makes me think about Assassin's Creed and how much they can learn from a game like this rather then the run up the mill grind they came up with every few years.

title: SOLO QUEUING WITH NO HUD IN VALORANT
description: The HUD is one of the most important pieces of tech you have in Valorant, more so than ANY abilities, so what would happen if we took it away? Today I'll be solo-queuing in Valorant to see just how effective this strategy of absolute game focus and ignorance of information is on performance! If you find this experiment interesting, let me know in the comments so I can make more! Anyway, enjoy the video and thanks for watching!

title: VALORANT Gameplay (PC HD) [1080p60FPS]
description: Valorant (stylized as VALORANT) is a free-to-play multiplayer tactical first-person shooter developed and published by Riot Games, for Microsoft Windows. Announced under the codename Project A in October 2019, the game began a closed beta with limited access on April 7, 2020, and was fully released on June 2, 2020.
